name: The America Party
description: $TAP – The America Party is the party that actually represents America. It stands for the 80% of Americans in the middle, the hard-working, freedom-loving citizens who believe in opportunity, unity, and the core values that built this nation. In a time when extremes dominate the conversation, TAP offers a voice for the silent majority. Pro-freedom, pro-opportunity, pro-America. TAP is about bringing people together to restore strength, pride, and purpose in the American spirit. It’s more than a party, it’s a movement to reclaim the heart of the nation.
